verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, when all these things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon thee, the b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> and the curse <S%H7045><s%>, which I have set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and thou shalt call <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them to mind <S%H3824><s%> among all the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whither the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath driven <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee,

And shalt return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and shalt obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> according to all that I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, thou and thy children <S%H1121><s%>, with all thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>;

That then the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy captivity <S%H7622><s%>, and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> <S%H8765><s%> upon thee, and will return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee from all the nations <S%H5971><s%>, whither the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee.

If any of thine be driven out <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto the outmost <S%H7097><s%> parts of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, from thence will the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee, and from thence will he fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee:

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> which thy fathers <S%H1><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and thou shalt possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it; and he will do thee good <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee above thy fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will circumcise <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> with all thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, that thou mayest live <S%H2416><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all these curses <S%H423><s%> upon thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and on them that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, which persecuted <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

And thou shalt return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will make thee plenteous <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in every work <S%H4639><s%> of thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%>, for good <S%H2896><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> <S%H8800><s%> over thee for good <S%H2896><s%>, as he rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over thy fathers <S%H1><s%>:

If thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which are written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%>, and if thou turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> with all thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.
For this Mitzvah <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, it is not hidden <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> from thee, neither is it far off <S%H7350><s%>.

It is not in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, that thou shouldest say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Who shall go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for us to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and bring <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto us, that we may hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it?

Neither is it beyond <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, that thou shouldest say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Who shall go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> for us, and bring <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto us, that we may hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it?
But the word <S%H1697><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto thee, in thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, that thou mayest do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%>, and death <S%H4194><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%>;

In that I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, that thou mayest live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: and the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee in the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

But if thine heart <S%H3824><s%> turn away <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so that thou wilt not hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, but shalt be drawn away <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8694><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them;

I denounce <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that ye shall surely <S%H6><s%> <S%H8800><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and that ye shall not prolong <S%H748><s%> <S%H8686><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> upon the land <S%H127><s%>, whither thou passest over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to record <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8689><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> against you, that I have set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you life <S%H2416><s%> and death <S%H4194><s%>, b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> and cursing <S%H7045><s%>: therefore choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, that both thou and thy seed <S%H2233><s%> may live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

That thou mayest love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and that thou mayest obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and that thou mayest cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto him: for he is thy life <S%H2416><s%>, and the length <S%H753><s%> of thy days <S%H3117><s%>: that thou mayest dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Avraham <S%H85><s%>, to Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and to Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them.
